content.webTitle: Tell us how your school or church will be affected by the general election

fields.headline: Tell us how your school or church will be affected by the general election
fields.bodyText: With five weeks to go until Britain goes to the polls, electoral services teams around the country are rushing to ensure that everything goes smoothly. But, with an election date in the run-up to Christmas, there are likely to be disruptions. We’d like to hear about any issues you are having, wherever you are in the country, in the run-up to the snap election. Is your primary school having to forgo its nativity play? Has the church had to reschedule its festivities? Other issues are you experiencing? Share your experiences We are interested in hearing from people about what’s going wrong as a result of such a fast turnaround election. Tell us about your experiences in the encrypted form below. You can also get in touch via WhatsApp by clicking here or adding the contact +44(0)7867825056. Leave contact details if you can as one of our journalists may be in touch to discuss further. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
